## browserEvents.isTargetInput() function

Returns true if this event is targeting a text input widget?

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function isTargetInput(e: Event): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  e | Event | An event. |

<b>Returns:</b>

boolean

True if text input.
